sentences.sContent: His second wife, Alice, was determined to alienate him from his two boys.
sentences.sCn: 他的第2个妻子阿丽丝决心让他疏远他的两个儿子。

remMethod.val: a + lien(看作lie， 说谎) + ate(使) → 谎言会离间朋友 → 离间， 使疏远

words.tran: 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的
异化；疏远；转让；[内科] 精神错乱；间离效果（alienation effect）

trans.tranCn: 使疏远， 离间； 转让， 让渡； 使转移
trans.tranOther: To alienate a person from someone or something that they are normally linked with means to cause them to be emotionally or intellectually separated from them
